revised_title: Further Observations on the Organisation of Fossil Plants of Coal-Measures: Calamites, Calamostachys, and Sphenophyllum
tldr: This article presents detailed observations on the organization and structure of fossil plants from the coal measures, specifically Calamites, Calamostachys, and Sphenophyllum. The author examines the vegetative structure, growth, and reproductive systems of these plants, providing insights into their classification and evolution. The study contributes to the understanding of ancient ecosystems and the development of plant life on Earth.
